column1: 12:00|noon|"By noon the next day the wiggles had cleared
column2: and it was safe to fold up the Void. Esk did so
column3: and Metria gave him a final goose and separated from him. He had failed
column5: and now had a new chore to tackle."|"Vale of the Vole"|"Piers Anthony"
